item.description:
The weather forecast is for mostly sunny skies with only a 10% chance of rain on Tuesday. With all the rain, lightning, and tornados we've had lately a good day should be taken advantage of.

Distance: 9.55 miles
Elevation gain: 3427 ft
Book Time: 6 hours and 30 minutes

This hike starts from the Piper Trail which is located behind Davies Campground and General Store on Route 16 in Albany, NH. There is a sign indicating the Piper Trail on Route 16. There is a small fee for parking.

The hike will go up The Piper Trail for 1.2 miles then turn onto the Nickerson Ledge Trail. We will gets some southern views from Nickerson Ledge then turn onto Carter Ledge Trail. Crater Ledges provide many views by climbing steeply up bare ledges that can have some poor footing and slick slopes at points. This takes us to Middle Sister Trail which wil take us over all three Sisters (First, Middle, and Third). Then we will take the Piper Trail top the summit of Chocorua and follow it back down to the cars.


Please keep your rsvp's up to date. Its very important that we have a true headcount, and not worry that your late or lost.

Make sure your hiker profile is complete so we can verify that your qualified to join us on this White Mountain hike.

See What to wear on a hike and pack water and food.

Your response/signing up for a hike certifies that you have read, understand, and agree with the NEHAAG disclaimer.

Carpooling is always advised and a great way to get to know your fellow members.
item.name: Chocorua & Three Sisters Tomorrow
